line: someone on the subway licked my neck

hey divorced men are not bad men
they have that on the napkins at the club
oh i gotta get back to work
you don’t have to be back for a half hour
yeah but my assistant tag does sit ups in the office during lunch
i could just spread him on a cracker

i mean y’know you can’t date him right
although we made a joke that we spend so much time together he should call me his work wife
soon he’ll be able to call you that lady he knew who got fired
i am not gonna get fired because i’m not gonna act on it
so you wouldn’t mind if he was dating someone else
he’s dating that slut in marketing

oh well drop and give me ten more
uh i i had a drink with lunch
did those cost reports come in

oh great could you make me four copies of those
i’m just uh about to umm go out to the store to get some stuff to put in my backpack
y’know like dried fruit and granola and stuff
oh i was gonna talk to him about doing something tonight
got a little crush on tag there do ya
well we’ve been flirting back and forth but i was hoping that tonight it would turn into something a little more than that
okay whoa whoa easy there melissa
this ain’t a locker room okay
but y’know i remember him saying that that he had plans tonight
yeah melissa i don’t want to be known as the uh office bitch but i will call your supervisor
now chandler you want to give us a smile

chandler listen to me sweetie i know you can do this
all right maybe you don’t have to smile
let’s try umm try looking sexy
uhh well i’ve got an audition down the street and i spilled sauce all over the front of my shirt
you got anything that’s not ralph lauren
yeah i don’t think so joe
all right i guess this will be fine
hey listen umm what what are you doing tonight
how would you feel about taking out my assistant tag
huh rach i got to say it’s gonna take a lot of money for me to go out on a date with a dude
i’m not asking you to go on a date with him
‘cause i could kinda use the money
joey just just he he’s new in town and i know he doesn’t have any guy friends
just take him to like a ball game or something
let’s try a look of far off wonderment
okay we’ll we’ll gaze into our future and we’ll think about our marriage and the days to come
what is the matter with your face
i mean this picture is supposed to say geller and bing to be married not local woman saves drowning moron
it seems to say i love you and that’s why i have to kill you
find the one where you make your bedroom eyes
why did you ever sleep with me

i’m having a really good time
i’m sorry that guy in the subway licked your neck
no that’s okay he’s a friend
hey uh i don’t mean to be presumptuous but i have these two tickets to the ballroom dancing finals tomorrow night if you want to go
yeah i well y’know i i mean i missed the the semi finals so i’d just be lost
i know it’s really lame but i got these tickets from my boss and oh no
no it’s uh my ex wife whitney is out there
i cannot deal with her right now
yeah umm that’s whitney kyle’s ex wife out there now do you think that you can y’know divert her so that we can slip out
well okay but i have two tickets to the ballroom dance finals
look i don’t think so pheebs
but just because you’re a friend
look i’m sorry but you you you better go pheebs
all right well i just wanted to say thank you though for diverting kyle’s ex
you were supposed to divert her not date her
i’m sorry but can you give me a second while i talk to this woman who by the way did not spend the night
i did divert her and we ended up having a great time
that’s where we realized we were both super cool people
well look look okay ross kyle just told me some really bad stuff about her
like she’s really mean and she’s over critical and and no
she will paint a room a really bright color without even checking with you
she uses s x as a weapon
at breakfast i’ll be on full alert for room painting and s x weapons
you’re still gonna go out with her
well didn’t you just hear what i said
of course her ex husband’s gonna say that stuff
uh your door isn’t sound proof
nothing is good enough for her
hey so did you have fun with uh with joey last night
we went to the knicks game
then we went to this bar and he hooked us up with all these women
and i never used to be able to just talk to girls in bars but i got like 20 phone numbers last night
wow man so joey must’ve really taught you some stuff huh
now pretend i have a camera
all right all right all right all right you wanna know what i do when i take resume shots
okay first first of all you want to make it look spontaneous
i look down look down keep looking down then i look up
look down you’re looking down keep looking down
why is there jelly on your shoe
so uh heard you had some fun with tag last night
yeah and you had fun teaching him how to be all joey
hey well you can’t teach someone to be good with women
y’know that’s why i never had any luck with chandler
all right would would you mind just not going out with him again
okay just the idea of you and he and all these women it’s just and i know he’s my assistant and i can’t date him but it just bothers me all right
no no no no you can’t take him away from me
i got a great partner to pick up girls with
all right will you will you at least tell him how hollow and unsatisfying this dating tons of women thing is
i just don’t want him to meet anybody until i am over my crush and i will get over it
it’s it’s not like i love him it’s just physical
but i mean i get crushes like this all the time
i mean hell i had a crush on you when i first met ya
did you have a crush on me when you first met me
can you people not see me
so will you talk to him
i’ll give you ten free ralph lauren shirts
hey joey you wanted to talk to me
you uh you got something for me
oh yeah this is from rachel
now tag there’s such a thing as too many women
yeah joey said i uh i needed to relax so he gave me an antihistamine
yeah and then i fell asleep on the subway and went all the way to brooklyn
i don’t know but don’t worry don’t worry because i know how to take a picture now
look down look down look down
so how are things going with crazy
has she cooked your rabbit yet
listen you are hearing one side of the story okay and f
i she must’ve shown kyle over 30 paint samples before she painted that room
and his response to each one was i don’t give a tiny rat’s ass
yeah well maybe she should’ve spent a little less time decorating and a little more time in the bedroom
well i don’t think we are gonna have that problem but maybe that’s just because i am not emotionally unavailable
well maybe he wouldn’t be if she didn’t bring the office home every night
well excuse her for knowing what she wants to do with her life
yeah well she certainly knew what she was doing new year’s eve 1997
i knew you were gonna throw that in my face
we want the last six years back
i’m sorry you had to see that
thanks hey so uh what’d you do last night
another night of bird dogging the chickas
we had a really good talk
i don’t think i’m gonna do that bar scene anymore
i did not see that coming
it’s just not really who i am
yknow i’ve always been happier when why am i telling you this
you don’t care about this stuff

when i’m in a relationship i love having a girlfriend
do you believe that there is one perfect person for everyone
and if that person is already in your life you should do something about it right

this is gonna be a while

well i went over to kyle’s last night to pick up a few things and we got to reminiscing
we talked through most of the night and we realized that the reason we were so angry at each other was because there are still feelings there
we’re gonna give it another try
what about her whining and her constant need for attention
oh right because you’re so capable of change
y’know he hums when he pees
it makes him miss the bowl but whatever
that’s all right we we don’t need you

i don’t give a tiny rat’s ass

yeah i hurt my back a little

yeah we are better off without them
